.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-1 {
    width: 42px;
    height: 40px;
    background-position: -10px -10px;
}

.sprite-2 {
    width: 46px;
    height: 40px;
    background-position: -72px -10px;
}

.sprite-3 {
    width: 42px;
    height: 40px;
    background-position: -138px -10px;
}

.sprite-4 {
    width: 31px;
    height: 40px;
    background-position: -200px -10px;
}
